title: Sharing Validation
description: Validates content for sharing and marketplace requirements. Identifies custom capabilities and potentially problematic content that may affect distribution.

fields.title: Custom Capabilities
fields.description: Information about custom capabilities the pack requires (experiments, Beta APIs, etc.). Some capabilities may limit where content can be shared.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the name of the custom capability required
